title: Person of Interest : Shaw's alone time with Bear
author: The69Observer
comment: Now is it me, or does Shaw show some feelings for this Belgian Malinois?
“bear’s gone all belgian supermodel on me”  haha
The little panic in Shaw's voice when she calls Harold about bear, so sweet
God bless Jonah Nolan for hiring Sarah Shahi to play shaw.
This was an awesome show. Bear was an awesome character
description: Shaw already told us in the past. Her main reason to stay with the team is the dog. The dog's main reason to stay with the team is Harold.
